nodes.text: Tiree Captison was the wife of Yeorg Captison. The sister-in-law of Dol Captison and the aunt/adoptive mother of Gaeriel Captison, Tiree married Yeorg Captison sometime before the latter became a senator in 26 BBY.
Sometime before 18 ABY, Tiree and Yeorg's orphaned grand-niece Malinza Thanas was adopted by another family.
